scenario_text.value: Huh? Ryo? You out here by yourself?
You got it. Just you, huh, Takuma?

(Man... I don’t even know what to say to
Ryo...)

(Unlike Minoru, I have a hard time talking
with him...)
Oh, uh...sorry to bother you, then. So long!

Just a second now! Where do you think you’re
going?!

I’ve been meaning to talk with you anyway, so
just chill out, would you?

Uh, I don’t have any money, so if that’s what
this is about...

Ugh, not even close, you idiot! It wouldn’t
even be worth shaking you down out here!
This is about...well, uh, you know!

(Sounds like Ryo is having a hard time
spelling this out. Wait! I think I get it.)

If you want to use the bathroom, go right
ahead. Don’t let me stop you.

Oh, come on! That’s not it at all! What is
wrong with you?! Don’t you get it?
I wanted to say...thanks.
What?
How should I react?
What did you just say?
You’re...thanking me?
A bolt from the blue!
What did you just say?
Did you not hear me? Well, then forget it.

No, I mean, I heard you, but... Did you
seriously just say thanks?!

(I didn’t think that word was in his
vocabulary!)
Tch... Whatever. You heard me.
Just wanted to say that, okay?
You’re...thanking me?
Yeah...
Seriously? You? You’re thanking me?

What? You act like I’m a huge jerk or
something!
Oh no! It’s not that. I just can’t see why.
Well, uh, it’s ’cause...
It’s ’cause you saved my life, okay?
I just wanted to thank you for that.
Talk about a bolt from the blue!
What bolt? What are you talking about?

Don’t you know that expression? It’s like a
lightning bolt out of a clear sky. A shock.
Huh?! Wait, what’s so shocking?!

I mean, you’re actually thanking me. I don’t
think I’ve ever heard you say that before.

Tomorrow’s gonna be a cold day in hell. There
could be a blizzard. Maybe it’ll freeze over.

What, are you serious? You think I’m that big
of a jerk?!
Look, Takuma...

I’m not gonna treat the guy who saved my life
like dirt. That’d be low, even for me.

When all that stuff was goin’ down, I...
Nah, never mind.

Hey, what gives? Now I’m curious. What were
you going to say?
Just forget it! See you around, okay?
